body:
Fixed cmake by updating checksum
Updated version of py-statsmodels

Adding builds for remote sensing data processing software such as RSGISLib (https://www.rsgislib.org), ARCSI (https://arcsi.remotesensing.info) and EODataDown (for automating the downloading and processing of EO data):

py-arcsi
py-compute-job-recorder
py-eodatadown
py-opendatacube
py-planet
py-py6s
py-python-fmask
py-rios
rsgislib
sixs

This required the following additional dependencies:

py-cachetools
py-deap
py-gitdb
py-gitpython
py-google-auth
py-google-cloud
py-google-resumable-media-python
py-ml-tooling
py-pyod
py-pypeg2
py-pysolar
py-smmap
py-stopit
py-tpot
title: Adding remote sensing packages
